channel.title: Cloudflare R2 Incidents
channel.description: RSS feed of Cloudflare incidents related to R2

item.title: Increase latency on R2 operations on WNAM buckets
item.description: We are currently investigating high long-tail latency on some R2 requests with buckets in the WNAM region. Impacted buckets will see increased latency on PutObject operations. Impacting Stream Live broadcasts, R2. Stream on-demand and media transformations are not affected.
